Vancouver is home to over 40,000 cherry trees. The annual Vancouver Cherry Blossom Festival (VCBF) celebrates these blooms with community events, including the "Big Picnic" at David Lam Park and "Sakura Days" at the VanDusen Botanical Garden.
*   **Key Timing:** Late March through mid-April.
*   **Source:** [Vancouver Cherry Blossom Festival Official Site](https://vcbf.ca/)

Just a short drive east of Vancouver, the Fraser Valley hosts massive tulip festivals that rival those in the Netherlands.
*   **Harrison Tulip Festival:** Formerly the Chilliwack Tulip Festival, it has moved to Agassiz and features millions of blooms.
*   **Lakeland Flowers:** Located in Abbotsford, this is currently the largest tulip festival in Western Canada.
*   **Source:** [Destination BC - Spring Flowers Guide](https://www.hellobc.com/stories/where-to-see-spring-flowers-in-bc/)

*   **Key Timing:** Starting in April.
*   **Source:** [Destination Vancouver - Whale Watching](https://www.destinationvancouver.com/activities/whale-watching/)

While Stanley Park is great year-round, spring is when the rhododendrons and azaleas at the Ted and Mary Greig Rhododendron Garden are in full bloom. For a more curated experience, VanDusen Botanical Garden features a spectacular "Laburnum Walk" in late May.

*   **Quarry Rock (Deep Cove):** A popular, easy-to-moderate hike that provides a stunning view of Indian Arm.
*   **Source:** [Vancouver Trails - Spring Hikes](https://www.vancouvertrails.com/blog/best-spring-hikes-vancouver/)

The Vancouver Sun Run is Canada's largest 10K road race. Held every April, it attracts over 40,000 runners and walkers. It is a massive community event that takes participants through some of the most scenic parts of the city.
*   **Key Timing:** Mid-to-late April.
*   **Source:** [Vancouver Sun Run Official Site](https://www.vancouversunrun.com/)

Opening in late April, this is the largest night market in North America. It is a staple of Vancouver’s spring and summer, featuring hundreds of Asian street food stalls, live entertainment, and carnival games.
*   **Key Timing:** Opens late April.
*   **Source:** [Richmond Night Market](https://richmondnightmarket.com/)
